sink.preCopyScript:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'CustomerSource' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo')
BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.CustomerSource;
END

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'CustomerSource' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo')
BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.CustomerSource;
END

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
    a.SK_ID_CURR AS customer_no,
    MAX(b.AMT_CREDIT) AS high_approval_credit,
    AVG(b.AMT_CREDIT) AS avg_approval_credit,
    COUNT(DISTINCT b.NAME_CONTRACT_TYPE) AS count_consumer_loans,
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.CREDIT_ACTIVE) AS count_credit_active,
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.CREDIT_DAY_OVERDUE) AS count_credit_overdue,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN d.DAYS_INSTALMENT > 30 THEN d.DAYS_INSTALMENT END) AS count_payday_30,
    SUM(a.AMT_INCOME_TOTAL) AS income,
    COUNT(DISTINCT a.CNT_CHILDREN) AS cnt_children
FROM 
    dbo.application a
LEFT JOIN 
    dbo.previous_application b ON a.SK_ID_CURR = b.SK_ID_CURR
LEFT JOIN 
    dbo.bureau c ON a.SK_ID_CURR = c.SK_ID_CURR
LEFT JOIN 
    dbo.installment d ON a.SK_ID_CURR = d.SK_ID_CURR
GROUP BY 
    a.SK_ID_CURR;
